snippet: What evidence do you see that the site is still going strong — or that its popularity is fading?
abstract: What evidence do you see that the site is still going strong — or that its popularity is fading?
lead_paragraph: Last week Facebook offered billions of dollars to buy Snapchat, the social media app that lets users send posts that disappear shortly after being viewed. When the yet-to-be-profitable upstart refused the whopping 10-digit offer, many have started asking the same question: Is Facebook losing its edge? What do you think?
